content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find this apartment to be quite comfortable and ideally located. How much were you thinking of paying for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I'm a student and I'm on a tight budget. I was thinking of 300 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than my asking price. I'm looking for something closer to 600 euros per month. Is that within your budget?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I can go up to 400 euros per month, but that's already a stretch for me.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 400 euros is still below my expectations. I'm willing to negotiate, but I need at least 500 euros per month to make it worth my while. Is there any possibility for you to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I can go up to 450 euros per month. I can't really afford more than that.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 450 euros is still not enough for me. I'm sorry, but I cannot accept that. If you're serious about renting the apartment, you'll need to come up with a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I can go up to 480 euros per month. I can't really go any higher than that.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: 480 euros is closer to my asking price, but it's still not quite there. I'm willing to accept 500 euros per month as the lowest I can go. If you can meet that price, we can proceed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 500 euros [[/PRE][[/user]]
[user]
[/user]
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 500 euros! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
